translations: [计]光标；[计]游标；鼠标指针（cursor 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Open the cursors to be returned.
The AIM Research Group has developed two cursors.
sentences.translation: AIM研究小组已经开发了两种光标。

sentences.sentence: There is no MRF support for forward only cursors.
sentences.translation: 还没有针对单进游标的 MRF 支持。
